name: Rainbow Sword (itsohclay)
description:
This game is for the Weekly Game Jam
Theme: Rainbow
Description: You have discovered a new sword in the ruins of a castle but this sword is like no other, its a rainbow sword! But as soon as you harness this great power, magically spirits try to stop you from taking the sword.
Commands:
W, A, S, D - move
Left Click - Attack
